screen_desc: This is a mobile screenshot displaying hotel options in Seattle, WA. The map shows various hotels with prices ranging from $81 to $278. The user can filter search results by dates (October 16–17), hotel types (Top-rated, Budget options, Luxury stays), and other criteria. Hotel details include ratings, prices, and amenities such as free breakfast or Wi-Fi.
